name: Not So Paladin
description:
Description

Not So Paladin is a small game where you play as demoted adept of an holy order. Your new task is to explore an old mansion and find a desecrated artifact. Kil...putting to rest everything on your way. So be brawe, because only with your deeds and faith you will cleanse your name!

Controls

W,A,S,D - movement
LMB - attack
Q - healing
C - character sheet

Credits

Plasterbrain - Main Menu music
Yd - Ingame ambient
PlusleRin - Ingame music
'Mister Pixel' by Christophe Badani, Velvetyne Type Foundry - ingame font

Installation

  1. Unzip the folder
  2. Open "NotSoPaladin.exe"
  3. Play
